author: kjpena
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds classes needed for tuning the hit-compatibility cuts of the Cellular Automaton by seeding layer triplets, following up on the comments received for:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27955

More details in:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/845939/contributions/3552658/attachments/1904226/3144492/CACuts_KPena_2019-09-09.pdf
https://indico.cern.ch/event/905963/contributions/3811694/attachments/2022955/3414974/CACuts_KPena_2020-04-20.pdf

#### PR validation:
Workflow 10824.1 was used to check the performance in Phase1. 
A tracking-only workflow with D49 geometry was used to check the performance in Phase2. 

Tracking validation plots are available here: 
https://cern.ch/karla.pena/trackingTasks/CACuts/CMSSW_11_1_0_pre6/

Request for comments from @felicepantaleo, @mtosi, @VinInn, @JanFSchulte, @makortel
title: Cellular Automaton: Add hit-compatibility parameters tunable by layer triplets
